duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver exceptional customer service and sales efforts in retail locations, with a focus on wireless, home services, and business sales.
Dominating the telecommunications industry to achieve sales goals and provide operational excellence.
Staying current on the latest devices and plans to be the consultant for wireless and home services customers.
Working full-time with rotating shifts, including some evenings and Saturdays.

education_certification.credential: One year of customer service or sales experience or a bachelor’s degree or equivalent.
Passion for technology and staying updated on the latest devices and plans.
Ability to work an irregular schedule with rotating shifts, including some evenings and Saturdays.
Physical ability to work in a flexible schedule, including lifting 40 lbs of materials and standing for long periods.
